thread.title: PRNewswire: CABLExpress honored among best in cabling industry by CI&M's 2015 Innovators Awards program
thread.title_full: PRNewswire: CABLExpress honored among best in cabling industry by CI&M's 2015 Innovators Awards program

title: PRNewswire: CABLExpress honored among best in cabling industry by CI&M's 2015 Innovators Awards program
text:
PRNewswire: CABLExpress honored among best in cabling industry by CI&M's 2015 Innovators Awards program September 25, 2015 
Josh Taylor (center), senior product manager at CABLExpress, accepts   Award from  's Patrick McLaughlin (left), chief editor, and Alan Bergstein (right), group publisher. Taylor accepted the award on behalf of the CABLExpress and WellSpan Health Structured Cabling and Network Visibility Project   on Monday, September 21, 2015. 
SYRACUSE, N.Y., Sept. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- CABLExpress announces that its WellSpan Health Structured Cabling and Network Visibility Project was recognized among the best in the industry by the judges of the   2015 Innovators Awards program   . The judging panel consisted of   system specifiers, designers, integrators and managers with vast professional experience. CABLExpress was recognized as a Silver honoree. "We are proud to receive     our collaboration with WellSpan Health," said Peter Belyea, president of CXtec, the parent company of CABLExpress. "We strive to solve our customers' challenges with solutions that provide real business value and make a lasting impact on overall organizational goals. This project is a true representation of that." WellSpan Health achieved several business outcomes through its partnership with CABLExpress, including: * Improved efficiency and reliability of its network due to effective structured cabling design .
* A stable framework and plan for future growth enabled by increased scalability of layer one infrastructure . 
* The ability of IT staff to focus on business-critical tasks because of greater network visibility and proactive traffic monitoring. 
* Enhanced patient and caregiver experiences across the health network resulting from advanced technology capabilities. 
"On behalf of the   Innovator Awards, I would like to congratulate CABLExpress on their Silver-level honoree status," said   Group Publisher Alan Bergstein. "This competitive, unbiased program celebrates the most innovative projects in the structured cabling industry. We are pleased to celebrate CABLExpress' Silver status and recognize their contribution to the structured cabling industry." [Native Advertisement] To view a full case study on this project, visit www.cablexpress.com/WellSpan . About   Published since 1993,   has provided practical information to professionals responsible for the specification,   structured cabling systems in enterprises, data centers and campuses.  's magazine, website (www.CablingInstall.com), email newsletters and webcasts help cabling professionals improve day-to-day operations and enable strategic planning for their networks' optimum long-term performance. About the   2015 Innovators Awards Program The   2015 Innovators Awards program reviews and recognizes the most-innovative applications of   technology products and systems within the structured cabling industry. Platinum, Gold and Silver Honorees were announced at BICSI's 2015 Fall Conference in Las Vegas on Monday, September 21, 2015. Criteria used in the Innovators Awards ranking included: innovation, value, sustainability, collaboration, and impact. About CABLExpress® CABLExpress, a division of CXtec, has manufactured high-performance cabling and data center infrastructure products and structured cabling solutions for more than three decades. The CABLExpress Skinny-Trunk® Solution is a high-density, fiber optic product line that helps organizations maximize business value and prepare their layer one infrastructures for future generations of upgrades. For more information, visit www.cablexpress.com. Media Contact:
